sentences.sContent: When you fail, you should never lose heart.
sentences.sCn: 当你失败时，你不应丧失信心。

sentences.sContent: When we meet with failure, we don't lose heart.
sentences.sCn: 当我们遇到困难时，不可丧失信心。

synos.tran: 丧失信心，失去信心；丧失勇气

trans.tranOther: to stop hoping for sth or trying to do sth because you no longer feel confident
